attributes.action: FMG Enforce prosecution by police to stop further disgusting femail mutilation
attributes.background:
West Midlands Police disgusting reply.
For clarity @WMPolice WILL prosecute parents or cutters if in the child's best interests.

rejection.details:
Policing in the West Midlands is the responsibility of the local Police and Crime Commissioner (PCC), who is elected. You could contact the PCC directly to raise your concerns:

http://www.westmidlands-pcc.gov.uk/contact
